<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Boaster's Challenge](/Feats.aspx?ID=1068) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 74 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Firebrand Braggart](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=24)

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5), Expert in [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6), or Expert in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7); [Firebrand Braggart Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1067)

</column>

---

You call out a foe, causing them to become flustered and easier to defeat. Select one creature you can see and declare a challenge. For your challenge, attempt a Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation check against that creature’s Will DC. Your challenge must include a [linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101), [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), or [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163) component and gains the corresponding trait. If you succeed, you gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls with your weapon or unarmed Strikes against that foe until the end of your next turn; if you have master proficiency in the skill you used, you gain a +4 status bonus instead, and if you’re legendary, you gain a +6 status bonus. On a critical success, the status bonus lasts for 3 rounds instead. Whether you succeed or fail, creatures who witnessed your challenge gain a +4 circumstance bonus to their Will DCs against your attempts to challenge for 1 minute.

<title level="2">Boaster's Challenge leads to...</title>
[Demanding Challenge](/Feats.aspx?ID=1073)
